name: Rules
text: The board shall adopt rules in accordance with chapter 91 in order to effectuate the purposes of this chapter.  Such rules shall provide, without limitation, for definitions; planning generally and for intensive agricultural uses; general eligibility requirements; qualifications of applicants; preference rights; disposition of leases; lease provisions; lease restrictions generally and for intensive agricultural uses; and notice of breach or default.  Rules adopted by the board for the purposes of this chapter shall be consistent with sections 171-11 and 171-20. [L 1986, c 222, pt of §1; am L 1988, c 22, §5; am L 1990, c 52, §6]
